review_content: This basic mathematics course was really helpful. My child gained a solid foundation in math.
The advanced English grammar course was good but could benefit from more interactive exercises.
The introduction to science was okay, but my child struggled to keep up with the lessons.
World history for beginners is an excellent course. It was engaging and well-structured.
The creative writing workshop helped my child unlock their creativity, but it could use more personalized feedback.
Physics Made Simple is a decent course but lacked sufficient real-life examples to clarify complex concepts.
The Chemistry Essentials course was amazing. My child loved the experiments and the clear explanations.
Art and Design Basics was a fun course, but I think more hands-on practice could have improved my childâ€™s skills.
Introduction to Programming was excellent. My child now has a strong understanding of Python.
Music Theory for Beginners was helpful but lacked sufficient depth in the subject matter.
